articles.title: Boston Archdiocese calls on Dedham church to remove Nativity scene protesting ICE
articles.description:
“The display should be removed, and the manger restored to its proper sacred purpose," the Archdiocese of Boston said in a statement.

The post Boston Archdiocese calls on Dedham church to remove Nativity scene protesting ICE appeared first on Boston.com.
